website_summaries.verdict: Reebok QuickChase is road running shoe designed for neutral foot movement. The shoe delivers a good blend of comfort, breathability, and flexibility. With its low-cut and lightweight design, this shoe is best for long distance running and uptempo trainings.
pros: Many runners mentioned that the QuickChase is extremely comfortable
The shoe is lightweight, as noted in some reviews
The Reebok QuickChase is flexible, according to some users
Some runners applauded the breathable upper coverage of the QuickChase
A couple of runners liked the looks of the shoe
Some runners loved the understated appeal of this shoe
cons: Some runners found the shoe to be too tight for their liking
Several runners had varying issues regarding the shoe’s durability
Some runners were not happy with the support coming from this shoe

customer_reviews.title: WOULD NOT BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought reebok shoes and loved them , these are not good the sole is starting to come off after only 2 months , and there not even worn every day , sometimes a couple hours at time , in the house or car only, I would not buy again, I don't know if these are knockoffs or what is wrong , I have reeboks that I have worn for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My new work favorites plus use for tread mill also. Very comfortable, great price. It was hot so I had to use the A/C while doing deliveries so I don't get sweaty and make my car smell lol. I put the AC on to blow on my legs and can feel the cool air going into the shoe. That same effect occurs when walking or running as well. I'll get more colors eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas John Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneaker for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has always worn Nike brand sneakers until I purchased these Reebok's for him. He didn't like the new hot colors that Nike offers so he decided to try these plain ol' Reebok. He loves them! Nike run's sort of narrow verses a Reebok sneaker and he was concerned they would be too wide. They fit wonderful and he said the memory foam is so comfortable! He ordered a second pair!! Plus I ended up ordering my adult son a pair as he loved them so much! Great sneaker for a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M Joslin

customer_reviews.title: Develop problems quickly.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit as expected for size and looked pretty good out of the box. The mesh padding under the breathable criss-cross pattern did not extend to the tip of the shoe in the toe region on either shoe. As a result these developed a hole in the top of the criss-cross pattern on both shoes within two months. This was with the shoes fitting appropriately, the shoes always worn with socks, and the shoes worn an average of 3 times per week. My previous Reeboks did not have this issue and lasted 2.5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Tim V

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my first store-bought shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. They are comfortable and the gel insoles feel good. I have a hard size getting half sizes in stores so buying through amazon works great and the price is better. Follow up: The shoes are not as comfortable as the first pair I bought at the store. Also, the soft sole has already degraded. Will not buy online again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rivera

customer_reviews.title: hurt my feet but i'll give them a little time to get broken in; great price
customer_reviews.text: the right side of the left shoe rubs up against my foot and when i take it off my foot is all red and chafed. however, i bought these before and i now remember that they irritated my feet in the beginning, but they loosened up after a short while and felt fine. i hope this is the case here because the price is great; if they were to cost even a dollar more, i would say no good. the original black reeboks are still the best.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Hagerty

customer_reviews.title: Good looking - no arch support
customer_reviews.text: Poor arch support. I own three other pair of Reeboks at present and have worn them since they first came on the market. These, unfortunately, had almost no arch support, just some light foam I returned them. On the plus side, they're really goof looking.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Womack

customer_reviews.title: He loved them initially but after wearing them for only a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He loved them initially but after wearing them for only a few weeks the rubber on the bottom of the shoe started peeling off....he tried to glue it back on but ended up cutting off the piece that had peeled apart. Would probably buy these from a local store next time in order to return for defects after being worn.
customer_reviews.author: Shelle0211

customer_reviews.title: i like these as they are cooler to wear than leather ...
customer_reviews.text: i wanted a pair of reeboks that were similar to my old pair, and although these have a different name, they are a close match. i like these as they are cooler to wear than leather sneaks, but still give good support.
customer_reviews.author: tutter 2

customer_reviews.title: multiple bad reviews for exactly the same problem
customer_reviews.text: Pro, comfy. Con: One month and 14 days after purchase the sole is coming apart. These are poorly manufactured, would not buy them again. I've worn Reeboks since the 80's, this is the first pair this has happened with. The shoes these replaced are three years old, have been through many miles of hiking, climbing, and running and still have an intact sole. The uppers are failing, so time for new ones. Don't buy these, multiple bad reviews for exactly the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price-read above.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair of Reebok's that I have bought and they are really comfortable and fit great-ideal for walking and everyday stuff. I would say that if you buy these sneakers go a 1/2 size larger than what you normally buy-I knew that going in so I bought the right ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe Me...
customer_reviews.text: Memory foam became very worn very quickly unlike any other shoe purchased by from this brand. Good for walking and running.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Look for a better pair
customer_reviews.text: Worst Reebok Shoes I have ever worn. These shoes lasted about a month. The insoles are poor quality. The insoles fall apart first and the tread falls off. I'm not sure if I got a bad batch that had poor quality glue. I bought 3 pairs and all three failed after a month.
customer_reviews.author: M. White

customer_reviews.title: Best sneakers I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sneakers for all day walking or running. I bought these a few weeks before going to a big automotive flea market. I ended up walking about 8 hours each of the three days and never got sore feet. They're very comfortable and feel like your walking around on foam. Best sneakers I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: W. McKee, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are lightweight and all day comfortable. I like the fact that the Memory Tech cushions my feet.
customer_reviews.author: B.T.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price and love these sneakers! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Men's Quickchase Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable running shoe once broken in. At first I thought the size was too small but I just kept wearing them a few times around the home until they streched and felt really great. Now I can wear them all day at work and for my daily walks. Great shoe Reebok!
customer_reviews.author: Beagle Lover 24

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable and causes sore feet. On only wear for few hours and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes. They are lined with memory foam
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. They are lined with memory foam, its squishy, but feels great. Could not have gotten the price of $25 anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: They give me the perfect fit and total comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Reebok shoes exclusively for many years. They give me the perfect fit and total comfort. I'm retired but walk 7+ miles every day in my Reebok's. I won't even consider any other shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Corey

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes but not for using in rainy days.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes , the only complaint i have is that this is not waterproof and water can get in from the breathable sides :C.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Pichardo Linares

customer_reviews.title: I love that they are very breathable
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. I love that they are very breathable. My third pair. My others are still around, but very dirty. :)
customer_reviews.author: NHB3

customer_reviews.title: They ripped in a week
customer_reviews.text: They ripped on the side the first week I had then. I glued them . Was not real happy
customer_reviews.author: Cubs2007

customer_reviews.title: Squishy Tomatoes
customer_reviews.text: These kinda suck even for $30. They don't cushioning doesn't feel springy, more like walking on squishy overripe tomatoes. I wouldn't advise buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Kinda Sith

customer_reviews.title: It's not pretty but you'll feel like walking on pillows
customer_reviews.text: The single most comfortable shoes I have worn in my entire life 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Real Mckoy

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Always buy reebok running sneakers & always buy the same size. For some reason these are too small.
customer_reviews.author: Fierce

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are pretty cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are pretty cool and comfortable, but they are not very durable. The mesh snags and rips easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: I have purchase reebok shoes maby times before and there ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchase reebok shoes maby times before and there standard and quality has not change. it is a VERY comfertable shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: These fit like a glove, better than I expected. If I was a lot younger I would be running a lot in these. Nice fitting shoe.
customer_reviews.author: S Youngs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and the price is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Best sneakers I've bought in a long time. And the price point is incredible. Great for running and gym, or just walking to get groceries. The black pair go with everything. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A. Colunga

customer_reviews.title: alright shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were alright but I didn't "love love" them. They weren't bad just to wear until I wore them out.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy the Bull

customer_reviews.title: I have problems with my feet! The area around ...
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with my feet! The area around the toes is a little snug for my feet. I need shoes somewhat wider in that area. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The mesh is very thin, so I expect my toe to eventually work through the mesh. Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.author: Sean in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: A hole started forming near the toe
customer_reviews.text: It's been a week since I'm wearing this shoes and it's quite comfortable for daily use. Edited: After about 4 months of usage a small hole started forming at the toe. Disappointed with the quality of the mesh :(
customer_reviews.author: Rohith R Pai

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for a great price. Interior is comfortable but so squishy that it may be better for walks and casual runs. Great value and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Feels Like I'm Walking on Water
customer_reviews.text: Fit very well. Might be just a touch narrow, but my feet are too narrow for the next size up. Arch support is fine; I have to have arch supports regardless. Quite possibly the most comfortable running shoes I've ever owned. The "gel" stuff in the sole is awesome. Feels like you are walking on water.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bolen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are very comfortable in my daily walk. Good arch support and a good quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Jones

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these running shoes for my son who joined the track team. They fit well and were comfortable, but were actually a piece of garbage. After running in them five times, the tread is peeling off the bottom in huge pieces. These are a complete rip-off!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Five

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband says he loves them!!! They're his third pair!! I have no idea what else to say to finish this.
customer_reviews.author: RaeGina

customer_reviews.title: hold up well
customer_reviews.text: been running this shoe for several years. hold up well for 300 to 400 miles. some softer sole shoes have worn out less then 200 miles.this is my 6,7,or 8th. pair.
customer_reviews.author: mcduff

customer_reviews.title: Great kicks.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and has a really comfortable feel to it. Fit was as expected and can't complain about price.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a horrible time finding shoes that fit. These are as good as any others I've found,
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love my shoes. Awesome fit and they look great. Easy to keep clean. The price is appropriate for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: he says these are one of the most comfortable in the last dozen pairs of sneakers he has ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who works on his feet all day. he says these are one of the most comfortable in the last dozen pairs of sneakers he has had. The memory tech is the comfort. Plus they look nice. Win Win
customer_reviews.author: Christine Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are perfect also for running. I can run 5 miles with these shoes comfortably every day.
customer_reviews.author: michael feurtado

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sneaker is OK, however when I walk is formed a deformation in the intern side
customer_reviews.author: Reinaldo vivas

customer_reviews.title: good service
customer_reviews.text: got as expected on the mailing date , shoes are good to early to tell on the fit cause there new but look great
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very nice pair of shoes and that fits well and is very comfortable to walk in
customer_reviews.author: frederick mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and comfortable. Silver accent is a bit too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: ... is hard to find so when they fit as good as these shoes do
customer_reviews.text: Size 7 for men shoes is hard to find so when they fit as good as these shoes do, I consider it a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little more flimsy than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Vampses

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They have last long. I had to order some new tennis shoes because my new job wore them down.
customer_reviews.author: ronald

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy. Gives good support. My knees don't hurt as bad on the treadmill with these on.
customer_reviews.author: TD40

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good shoe but the fit was a little larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwormwholovescoffee

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got to love the cushion insoles. Soft and form fitting feels amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Levelone6one9

customer_reviews.title: i bought these for coaching and they are working out fine.
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the narrow side but overall a decent shoe. i bought these for coaching and they are working out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Denster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything perfect no problems, thank you very much. The preferred user. THX
customer_reviews.author: RocKmaN

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, fit well. They are not very water resistant, thus should not be worn in the rain. Water tends to soak right through.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 weeks the sole already started coming off very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: had them 2 weeks the sole already started coming off very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great shoe! I have never had any problems with these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Mac

customer_reviews.title: i ordered this one for my husband he has a ...
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this one for my husband he has a backache when he walkes or go jogging but he doesnt feel that with this one
customer_reviews.author: muneera d alahmari

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not think they were so narrow. I guess my feet are wider than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: SmokeSignals

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased as a gift, and he loves them. They fit perfect and are very comfortable. The price was great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! I have two pair now because I love them so much! Very good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: James Sobolewski

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good comfortable shoes for everyday use. I do not run! As far as my comment goes regarding arch support, I never found a pair of footwear that provided adequate arch support. These shoes were no different from other shoes or boots in that respect. For arch support I use Superfeet inserts.
customer_reviews.author: The Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy these shoes and I have several pair in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: brian bishop

customer_reviews.title: They fit so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes where just made for my foot. They fit so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: look good and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: look good and comfortable...I ordered the next size up based on some reviews saying they run small and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and seemingly worth more than The price if you're looking for a cheap running shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and not the Reebok quality I have had in the past!
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat comfortable. However it is obvious they are cheaply made. Sole is coming off after a couple month and only worn occasionally. Uppers are a cheaper than average material which I could live with it the tread of the soles weren't pealing off.
customer_reviews.author: zfasts

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the memory foam.
customer_reviews.text: I know it is all the rage, but I'm not loving the memory foam in the shoes. I had this same shoe before they switched to the memory foam. The old shoes were cut just a bit larger and they were more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Scivetti

customer_reviews.title: small for the size
customer_reviews.text: Some how this one fit too small. I love Reebok but I don't know what happened with this one
customer_reviews.author: PABLO TORRES PRIMO

customer_reviews.title: Mistake
customer_reviews.text: When I walk on wet grass, my socks get soaked. I made a mistake buying these shoes as the side are open.
customer_reviews.author: James W Stovall

product_meta.title: Reebok Mens Quickchase-Mens Quickchase
product_meta.description: Give your foot a superior ride in the reebok quick chase. An open weave and mesh upper, cushioned midsole, and memory tech sock liner make these ultra comfortable. A high-abrasion rubber outsole gives this shoe the durability to really go the distance.
